Uses of Package
com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

  • Packages that use com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine
    Provides a framework for rule evaluation over data shared from within database tables.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.analysis
    Provides a concrete rules engine that generates all possible end tuple states that can result from a rule evaluation.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app
    Provides a concrete rules engine that uses the SharedTuplePlatform to exchange tuples between engines.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform
    Provides the basic framework for sharing data within or between JVMs.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans
    Provides extensions to the ISharedDataPlatform to support the sharing of serialized Java objects.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans.jexl
    Provides support for Jave Expression Language-based conditions on shared bean data.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging
    Provides a framework for sending and receiving messages.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.dual
    Provides ability to send and receive messages to and from both within a JVM instance and between JVM instances.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.memory
    Provides in-memory (intra-JVM) message senders and receivers.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.network
    Provides network-based (inter-JVM) message senders and receivers.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor
    Provides a framework for monitoring the operation of the AbstractSharedData platform.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor.debugger
    Provides a client/server platform monitoring pair.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology
    Provides framework for physical and logical topology representation and monitoring.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.application
    Provides a framework for applications to define logical topolical relationships between nodes.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical
    Defines the requirements of the physical topology data structures and monitoring of the physical topology.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.centralized  
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.star
    Provides a physical topology implementation using a separate IDistributedApplicationRegistry implementation and thus assumes a fully connected network of nodes.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.registry
    Provides an application registry framework that allows applications to discover how communicate with each other.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.registry.fixed
    Provides support for a static registry of applications defined in a file.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.registry.wpml
    Provides a WPML PEP repository-based application registry.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples
    Provides extensions to the ISharedDataPlatform to support the sharing of relational data.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples.storage
    Provides various tuple storage implementations.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.concurrent
    Provides distributed synchronization facilities.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.dataHandler
    Provides a data caching and de-duplication framework.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian
    Provides a distributed neighbor monitoring system for the gaian database nodes.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.stash
    Provides simplified distributed named data sharing services.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.tools
    Provides command line tool implementations.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine 
    Class and Description
    IApplicationDescriptor
    Defines the information needed about an application instance.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.analysis 
    Class and Description
    IApplicationDescriptor
    Defines the information needed about an application instance.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app 
    Class and Description
    IApplicationDescriptor
    Defines the information needed about an application instance.
    IQueryResult
    Holds the one or more results of a query evaluated on a remote platform instance.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform 
    Class and Description
    AbstractStorageQuery
    Implements methods defined in IDataQuery interface and allows selection of shared data from the platform's IDataStorage instance.
    DataQueryMessage.DataQueryMessageType 
    IApplicationDescriptor
    Defines the information needed about an application instance.
    IDataAction
    Defines the operation to be performed when a continuous query has been satisfied.
    IDataCondition
    This is a condition that evaluated local to where the condition is defined.
    IDataQuery
    Represents a query against data stored in a platform's data storage.
    IDataStorage
    Extends the generic read-only storage to enable write operations.
    IPeerSelector
    Provides a way to specify a sub-set of application peers within the application's name space.
    IQueryResult
    Holds the one or more results of a query evaluated on a remote platform instance.
    IReadOnlyDataStorage
    Provides read-only storage of data shared across one or more ISharedDataPlatforms.
    ISharedData
    Defines the set of meta-data associated with data shared into the ISharedDataPlatform.
    ISharedDataDescriptor
    Describes a portion of the application data, for example a database table or scalar value.
    ISharedDataPlatform
    Provides support for implementing a single distributed application instance.
    SharedDataNotificationTrigger 
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDataCondition
    Provides default implementations that define the condition as a non-aggregate with no remote condition.
    AbstractSharedData
    Can be used to provide some of the convenience methods, currently over the descriptor.
    AbstractSharedDataPlatform 
    AbstractStorageQuery
    Implements methods defined in IDataQuery interface and allows selection of shared data from the platform's IDataStorage instance.

    Defines the information needed about an application instance.

    This is a condition that evaluated local to where the condition is defined.

    Represents a query against data stored in a platform's data storage.

    Extends the generic read-only storage to enable write operations.

    Holds the one or more results of a query evaluated on a remote platform instance.
    IReadOnlyDataStorage
    Provides read-only storage of data shared across one or more ISharedDataPlatforms.
    ISharedData
    Defines the set of meta-data associated with data shared into the ISharedDataPlatform.
    ISharedDataDescriptor
    Describes a portion of the application data, for example a database table or scalar value.
    ISharedDataPlatform
    Provides support for implementing a single distributed application instance.
    NamedDataQuery
    Generic type that allows queries of ISharedData by name from the IDataStorage within the platform.
    QueryResult 
    SharedDataDescriptor 
    SharedDataNotificationTrigger
